snippet: Scott Henry of Scotland remained atop the leader board at five-under-par 67 in the first round of the Madeira Islands Open, cut to 36 holes because of persistent fog.
abstract: Scott Henry takes first-round lead at the Madeira Islands Open, cut to 36 holes because of persistent fog at the European Tour’s 1,500th event.
lead_paragraph: Scott Henry of Scotland remained atop the leader board at five-under-par 67 in the first round of the Madeira Islands Open, cut to 36 holes because of persistent fog.
